item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. PCBs, copper pours, ground planes, and you (87 points | 21 comments)

3. Analysis of 76,882 Product Hunt Products, from 2014 – 2021 (29 points | discuss)

21. Etleap (YC W13) Is Hiring a Senior Software Engineer (SF) ( | hide)

25. Exposed DeepSeek database leaking sensitive information, including chat history (552 points | 360 comments)
26. We got hit by an alarmingly well-prepared phish spammer (180 points | 114 comments)
